author: Lesley Waters
method: Mix together the main ingredients, except the oil and whisky, and shape into three patties. Heat a pan with a drop of oil and fry for two minutes on each side. Add the whisky to the pan, warm and carefully set alight to flamb√© for a few seconds. Serve on a warm plate with the orange segments and mint sprig.
ingredients: 55g/2oz oats,  2 eggs, beaten,  55g/2oz self-raising flour,  55g/2oz caster sugar,  vegetable oil,  1 miniature whisky,  2 segments orange,  fresh mint sprig
